inclusion.criterion: patient ≥ 18 years old and competent to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: renal insufficiency defined as glomerular filtration rate (GFR) < 30ml/min/1.73m2
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to give informed consent or no informed consent obtained
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: inability to position an 18 gauge cannula in an antecubital vein
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 31-year-old woman with abdominal pain and leukocytosis. Computed Tomography of the abdomen shows a distended appendix without perforation, abscess or gangrene.
